lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Time to get up already…?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: At least this is the last day before we get a couple days to relax.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I’m beat... I feel like a rudely-revived corpse.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Through glazed eyes, I make out the familiar faces of my cohort.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: They’re also all exhausted, go figure.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Some turn back over in their bunk to catch 5 more minutes of sleep,

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Some begrudgingly sit up and stretch their muscles,

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: A couple comrades laugh to themselves.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: But we are all preparing ourselves for today, the big day.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Exam day.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Mornin' Ender.
I looked up and saw Petra sitting up in the bunk across from me.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Good morning, Petra.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ready for today?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Ready as I'll ever be.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Just as she finished that thought, we heard the loud stomping of a certain someone's boots from outside.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: None other than Sergeant Dap marched into our sleeping quarters and stood vigilantly by the door. His voice bellowed in the small space.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: UP! UP! UP!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: A robotic storage unit rolled into the room and parked next to him.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: LET'S GET THE DAY STARTED RECRUITS.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: Today, we have spcial team-colored suits.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: Put your suit on, go to the cafeteria, eat and meet back here.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: You have exactly...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: He looked at his watch and tapped on it with his finger.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: ... 58 minutes and 24 seconds...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: He turned around and walked calmly ou of the room

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The room's energy rose sharply as everyone clambered about.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Everyone lined up in front of the storage unit to collect their suit.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: These are some high tech suits for sure.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They have our team's logo on the left shoulder- a dragon.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This suit was not so different from pilot suits we already had.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Though they do look a lot better.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I put the suit on and went to get some breakfast.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Well this is surprising.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The cafeteria is serving scrambled eggs, sausage, pancakes, the works.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They're totally spoiling us.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I sat with the rest of my team at our usual table.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: So how is everyone feeling?

lines.speaker: Crewmate 1
lines.line: I'm feeling pretty confident.

lines.speaker: Crewmate 2
lines.line: Me too, I don't want to squander this. Not now.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I wish I could be as confident as you guys.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: There's always that part of me that worries.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: If I had to put money on someone succeeding, you're the one, Ender.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The table gave an encouraging laugh.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I laughed too.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They were right: all my life I've done nothing but worry.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: All my life I have been picked on.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Here, I fit in. Of all places, Battle School.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I smiled and finished my breakfast.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The cafeteria was the loudest I've heard it since I first got here. All the teams at the other tables are in good spirit.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Years ago, an alien mothership appeared in our Solar system.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It arrived on Earth and without warning...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Attacked us.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The onslaught was unrelenting.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We called them the 'Formic' species and they wreaked havoc across the globe.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: A brave team of fighter jet pilots were able to destroy the mothership.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They worked together to fly a nuclear warhead into the ship.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The pilots lost their lives to defend humanity.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: With the world in widespread panic, a program to fight the Formic forces was founded.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The program invited young teens in particular to join them.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Their belief was that the young, bright minds of today would save those of tomorrow.
